((Sorry it took so long.))

Liono/?4/Dark Convoy/Lilly/Koj/Inu/

::Lilly::
Gets hit by the blade missile her heat shielding marred and burned and 
starting to crack not being made to take that kind damage as she manages to 
remain on her feet. Lilly fires 25 exploding ninja at Demon Wulf.

::Koj::
Koj gets pelted by 3 fireballs his armor brunt and melting. Koj rolls out 
the way of the orb while the Fang start trying to restore his armor with the 
stolen optic blast energy. Koj locks on Dark Claw and fires 25 freezing 
ninja stars at him.

::Neo Bahamut::
Takes the 3 bolt as it ding his scaly hide breath out a another cone of acid 
at this time sweeping and focusing it at Flesh Ripper changes his lancer 
ports fire 8 explosive lancers at Flesh Ripper.

::?4::
Tigerhawk2 rips off his right wing using it as a shield as one of the blasts 
nails his side he defects the other laser blast. Tigerhawk2 fire 25 more 
lighting bolts at Chaos.

::Dark::
Dark fires 2 plasma bolts at the missiles to protect Liono. "Stay sharp 
Little Brother."

::Liono::
Liono fires 10 Fireball at the 24 shots at dark and 15 more exploding 
fireballs at Dark Claw. "I do have you to watch my back brother."

::Dark::
Dark avoiding what he can get hit 9 blast his chest plate marred. Dark aims 
fires dark plasma bolts 13 at Dark Claw and 12 at Flesh Ripper.
